channel.title: Graphics for server status page
channel.description:
I need a few (3) graphics for a new feature of the server status page: [quote="Moparisthebest, post:950, topic:275446"]I have added online images to the server status page that behave properly in all browsers, and query the database as to whether the server is online or not. (instead of opening a connection to your server, potentially crippling it like other sites do)
I am looking on feedback on where to put this info on the serverstatus page, but basically you can link to an image named like this: http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus/silabgarza.no-ip.biz.gif for the ip 'silabgarza.no-ip.biz'
So for the general case, link to an image like this: http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus/your_server_ip_as_registered_on_the_ss_page.gif
here is the one for silabgarza, to show you it works: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=silabgarza.no-ip.biz][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus/silabgarza.no-ip.biz.gif[/img][/url]
I can't do image work, so I am [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,425207.0.html]requesting new ones[/url] to be done on the moparisthebest.com graphics boards, the current ones I just downloaded from the internet.[/quote]
The current (shitty) images I am using are: http://www.moparisthebest.com/images/online.gif http://www.moparisthebest.com/images/offline.gif http://www.moparisthebest.com/images/error.gif
Size doesn't matter, but don't make it too big. Something similar (but obviously quite different) to: http://www.moparisthebest.com/statusimg.png would be fine, but with text like 'MoparScape - Server Status'.
The error pic needs to represent that the server is not registered on the serverstatus page: http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php I'm not sure what the best text would be given the limited amount of space. "Not Registered" or similar would be good, I don't really know and am open to suggestions.
If anyone could do this I would appreciate it, I don't actually care about the file type as long as it's something standard (gif, png, jpg) and decently small sized. No animations please.
If you need any more info, just ask. :)

item.title: Graphics for server status page
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:



Read full topic

item.title: Graphics for server status page
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Done finally:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:962, topic:275446”]Update: You no longer need to be registered and logged in to vote, although you certainly can be. Also the image stuff is finally finished and working perfectly, also allowing you to specify the image size that you want.

http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus/gls.blogsite.org.png

http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus/lifescape.no-ip.info.png

http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus/some-unregistered-ip.com.png

Now if you want to resize an image, you can do it one of 2 ways.

  1. You can scale the image by a percentage, 50 would make it half the original size, 150 would make it 50% bigger. This keeps the dimensions in tact so there is no skewing (50% in this case):
    http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus/50/gls.blogsite.org.png

  2. You can specify the exact dimensions you want the image to have (173x51 in this case):
    http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus/173x51/gls.blogsite.org.png

Everyone understand? If not post here. Now tell me where a good place to put this info is on the ss page?[/quote]

@Frell, yes, if you will give me the images without the www.moparisthebest.com text, but otherwise unchanged. Again, if you don’t mind could I have the source images too (like psd’s or something?)

Read full topic

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell

@Frell wrote:

Here is the unregistered one, i also modified the others to give you more room for the server name:


If you still need the moparscape link to be removed just let me know

Read full topic

item.title: Graphics for server status page
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

@MITB: Don’t forget about the imagettftext() function, will allow you to write much nicer looking things onto your images.

Read full topic

item.title: Graphics for server status page
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:4, topic:328813”]

Thats about all i really can do.[/quote]

Perfect, they look great! (edit2: actually I can’t manipulate them all I want with php since they have that transparent border around them, if you can remove it great, otherwise I probably can myself with GIMP) Could you do me one more favor and make one that looks the same but instead of online/offline says ‘Unregistered’, possibly with a orange or yellow background (like a warning sign) but if that’s too much trouble the same red as offline would be fine.

Kihomura, did you really make those without looking at the other site’s? If so that’s hilarious, since they look the same. I still appreciate the effort though.

edit: @Frell, also if it isn’t too much trouble, can I get a copy of all the images without the www.moparisthebest.com at the bottom (leave the space, remove the words)? Just in case I want to write the URL down there myself with PHP. Thanks again.

edit2: Looks great:

[quote=“Moparisthebest”]Update. New images, thanks to Frell. I also now write the IP on the image so you know what server is being checked:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus/gls.blogsite.org.png

http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus/lifescape.no-ip.info.png

Notice, in case you already put an image on your site, that these are .png and not .gif, as they used to be. I probably won’t change it again.[/quote]
Thanks to abraham for the idea!

Read full topic

item.title: Graphics for server status page
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I need a few (3) graphics for a new feature of the server status page:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:950, topic:275446”]I have added online images to the server status page that behave properly in all browsers, and query the database as to whether the server is online or not. (instead of opening a connection to your server, potentially crippling it like other sites do)

I am looking on feedback on where to put this info on the serverstatus page, but basically you can link to an image named like this:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus/silabgarza.no-ip.biz.gif
for the ip ‘silabgarza.no-ip.biz’

So for the general case, link to an image like this:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus/your_server_ip_as_registered_on_the_ss_page.gif

here is the one for silabgarza, to show you it works:

I can’t do image work, so I am requesting new ones to be done on the moparisthebest.com graphics boards, the current ones I just downloaded from the internet.[/quote]

The current (shitty) images I am using are:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/images/online.gif
http://www.moparisthebest.com/images/offline.gif
http://www.moparisthebest.com/images/error.gif

Size doesn’t matter, but don’t make it too big. Something similar (but obviously quite different) to:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/statusimg.png
would be fine, but with text like ‘MoparScape - Server Status’.

The error pic needs to represent that the server is not registered on the serverstatus page:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php
I’m not sure what the best text would be given the limited amount of space. “Not Registered” or similar would be good, I don’t really know and am open to suggestions.

If anyone could do this I would appreciate it, I don’t actually care about the file type as long as it’s something standard (gif, png, jpg) and decently small sized. No animations please.

If you need any more info, just ask.

Read full topic
